TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ContextBindingElement extends System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement implements class System.ServiceModel.Channels.IContextBindingElement, class System.ServiceModel.Description.IPolicyExportExtension
Public Class ContextBindingElement Inherits BindingElement Implements IContextBindingElement, IPolicyExportExtension
type ContextBindingElement = class inherit BindingElement interface IPolicyExportExtension interface IContextBindingElement

summary.span: 提供保護等級與交換機制做為繫結項目內容的一部分，也提供建置通道接聽程式與處理站的功能。

span.span: Provides a protection level and an exchange mechanism as part of the context of a binding element and the functionality to build the channel listeners and factories.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可讓使用者在服務繫結中新增項目，以管理其內容交換通訊協定。The allows the user to add an element to the binding of a service for managing its context exchange protocol. 通常堆疊在可靠性、安全性與傳輸繫結項目的頂端。The is typically stacked on top of reliability, security, and transport binding elements. 不需要任何組態選項，並可建立 、 和 的通道處理站。A does not require any configuration options and can create channel factories for , , and . 它也可以建立 、 和 的通道接聽程式。It can also create channel listeners for , , and . 內容通道不會變更通道介面，基礎通道堆疊必須支援要求的通道型別與工作階段功能。A context channel does not change the channel interface – the underlying channel stack must support the requested channel shape and session capability. 通道接聽程式和處理站是用來建構處理傳入和傳出訊息時使用的部分通道堆疊。The channel listeners and factories are used to construct the part of the channel stacks used to process incoming and outgoing messages. > [!NOTE] > 如果工作階段架構繫結以建立和指定的合約一起使用 = 、包含下列文字建立通道時會擲回: 「 通道內容管理無法啟用或停用之後開啟通道。 」If a session-based binding is created with a and used with a contract that specifies = , an is thrown when the channel is created with the following text: "Channel context management cannot be enabled or disabled after the channel is opened." 您必須將 設為 或 ，否則不可使用工作階段架構通道。You must set to or or not use a session-based channel. 建立自訂繫結時，建議您先將 新增至自訂繫結的 ，然後再新增任何可靠性與安全性繫結項目 (若有的話)。When creating a custom binding, it is recommended that you add the to the of the custom binding before adding any reliability and security binding elements, if present. 如果沒有這麼做，您的服務可能就會擲回 ，並附帶以下訊息︰If you do not, your service may throw a with the following message: 「內容通道收到具有內容的訊息，但它不符合目前在通道快取的內容。"Context channel received a message with context which does not match the current context cached at the channel. 請確定服務的內容與原先設定時相同，或透過將通道屬性 'IContextManager.Enabled' 設定為 false 以停用內容管理。」Ensure service does not change context after it was originally set or disable context management by setting channel property 'IContextManager.Enabled' to false."

summary.span: 新建一個從目前 物件初始化的這類物件。

span.span: Creates a new object initialized from the current one.

returns.span: 從目前 物件初始化的這類物件。

span.span: A object initialized from the current one.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複製的 物件與目前的 物件擁有相同的 與 值。The cloned object has the same and values of the current object. 這會建立目前繫結項目物件樹狀結構的完整複本 (也稱為深層複製)。This creates a complete copy of the current binding element object tree, also called a deep clone. 物件的深層複製會建立物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考之每個物件的複本，A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. 這個動作稱為複製整個物件圖形。This is called copying the entire object graph. 傳回深層複製可讓執行階段支援多個自訂繫結共用自訂繫結項目的情況。Returning a deep clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果沒有傳回深層複製，則表示執行階段行為尚未定義。If a deep clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 物件的淺層複製則只是物件的複本。A shallow clone of an object is a copy of the object only. 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立所參考之物件的複本，而只會複製原始物件的參考。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.
